newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Colombian peso ends lower at 1,041.
newsitem.headline: Colombian peso ends lower at 1,041.

text.p: Colombia's peso closed lower at 1,041 after one of the country's banks tapped the interbank market late in the day to cover short dollar positions, dealers said.
They said the peso held steady to slightly higher most of the session, but position-squaring by a bank buying U.S. currency shortly before the close forced it to end lower.
The peso traded at an intraday high of 1,035 and closed at the day's low. Dealers reported 408 trades for a total of $157 million and.
